newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products slightly up, helped by futures.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products slightly up, helped by futures.

text.p: NWE oil products were up slightly on Friday, helped by stronger futures, traders said.
Naphtha remained easy despite early crude gains. Thin buying and good avails kept downward pressure on prices.
Gasoline was stable to up $1 or so for Eurogarde barges, in line with crude gains and as NYMEX unleaded edged higher in ACCESS trade.
Gas oil was nudged $1 or so higher on the back of firmer IPE futures. Premiums were stable in a quiet market.
High sulphur fuel oil barges gained $1 on better bunker demand but markets in other grades were inactive
